content: As 2025 concludes, consumer AI is transitioning into a new phase where a limited number of products dominate everyday use, multimodal models have enabled novel creative workflows, and major AI labs have significantly expanded into consumer experiences.
By the end of 2025, it has become clearer which AI ideas successfully altered user behavior and which did not.
Consumer AI appears to be moving towards a winner-take-most market structure.
Subtle product design choices can be more impactful than the raw quality of the underlying AI model in consumer AI.
Templates, multimodality, and distribution are key factors shaping the next generation of consumer AI products.
